title.value: Влияние состава субстратных блоков на урожайность гриба шиитаке (Lentinus edodes)
Influence of substrate blokes composition on Lentinus edodes

journal.title: Agriculture and Plant Protection : scientific-practical journal

person.name: Tsyganov, A.R., Belarusian National Technical University, Minsk (Belarus)
Masterov, A.S., Belarus State Academy of Agriculture, Gorki (Belarus)
Korzh, D.Yu., Communal Farming Unitary Enterprise 'Combine 'East' (Belarus)

abstract.value: On vegetable dehydration plant 'Domanovichi' in Kalinkovichi district of Gomel region, which is a structural unit of CSEA 'Combine 'East', was done a radical modernization of production. When was installing a new industrial  equipment, which, along with the traditional Belarusian market of canned vegetables, allows to produce while unique products to the region – oyster  mushrooms and the Japanese shiitake mushrooms, were confronted with the problem of choosing the most efficient technology for growing mushrooms Lentinus edodes.
